title: Chapter 2D - Guide Signs - Conventional Roads
content:
Chapter 2D - Guide Signs - Conventional Roads

State Regulations
§ 2D.03 - Color, Retroreflection, and Illumination
§ 2D.11 - Design of Route Signs
§ 2D.26 - Advance Turn Arrow Auxiliary Signs (M5-1, M5-2, and M5-3)
§ 2D.29 - Route Sign Assemblies
§ 2D.34 - Confirming or Reassurance Assemblies
§ 2D.37 - Destination Signs (D1 Series)
§ 2D.40 - Location of Destination Signs
§ 2D.41 - Distance Signs (D2 Series)
§ 2D.43 - Street Name Signs (D3-1 or D3-1a)
§ 2D.45 - Signing on Conventional Roads on Approaches to Interchanges
§ 2D.52 - Slow Vehicle Turn-Out Sign (D17-7)
§ 2D.104 - Snowmobile Route Sign (NYM7-1)
§ 2D.105 - All Terrain Vehicle Route Signs (NYM17-1, NYM17-2)
§ 2D.107 - Name Auxiliary Signs (NYM14-26, NYM14-27)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
